name: BMP2GCode
short_description:
This project aims to create various types of GCode files from bitmap files. Currently (Working, but still needs some testing. So I haven't uploaded it yet) it can generate GCode for PCB designs from bitmaps. Next, I am planning to add edge tracing (with and without tool diameter compensation).

Project is planned & partially finished. Currently it can generate GCode for PCB files. However, it may skip some minor details. I will upload it after solving the problem.

Contact me for further suggestions :)
summary: A suite for creating GCodes from bitmap files

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by Industry or Sector :: Engineering

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Modern (Vendor-Supported) Desktop Operating Systems :: Linux
